deposit.solUpdate: SOL balance deposit has been updated.

homeHeroSection.title: Easy as Pie, Sweeter Gains
homeHeroSection.description:
Too many tokens, not enough time?

Creators bake the perfect mix of baskets ‚Äî one swap, one slice, full exposure.

basketComponentsToken.FdvTooltip: Fully Diluted Value. Market Cap is not available.

mdd.title: MDD
mdd.tooltip: MDD measures the maximum percentage loss from a basket‚Äôs peak value to its lowest point. It reflects the risk of the basket over time.

streamingFee.title: Streaming Fee
streamingFee.tooltip: Streaming fees are holding costs charged on basket tokens, analogous to TradFi's expense ratio, calculated annually as a percentage of the basket's value.

basketSlippageSetting.title: Max Slippage (%)
basketSlippageSetting.description: If the slippage is set too low, the trade might fail. Minimum: 1%

basketTrade.buyMinimumAmount: For smoother transaction, we recommend buying more than <fontweightBold>{amount} {ticker}</fontweightBold> at a time.

rebalancingInProgress.title: Rebalancing in Progress.
rebalancingInProgress.description: Trading is unavailable during basket component rebalancing. Please try again shortly.

progressStep1.caption: * Stay on this page until your transaction is created.

progressStep2.caption: * You can exit this page. This will close automatically in {count} seconds.

collateralized.title: Fully Asset-Backed
collateralized.tooltip:
When you buy a basket token, we purchase and collateralize actual component tokens to mint the basket token.

When you sell, we redeem the basket token, swap the components into SOL, and return the remaining SOL.

mevProtected.title: MEV Protected
mevProtected.tooltip: Your transaction is protected from MEV attacks, ensuring fair execution.

insufficientBalance.description:
You don‚Äôt have enough balance to trade.

Please consider additional fees when trading.
insufficientBalance.caption: *Gas fees, Jito fees, rent fees(for buys only), etc.

rebalancing.description:
The trade failed due to a rebalancing timing issue.

Please try again later.

slippage.title: Slippage adjustment needed
slippage.description:
You need to increase the slippage range for the trade to go through.

Try increasing the slippage.

unexpectedError.descriptionUnexpectedError: During your buy/sell process, an unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

partialTradeDetected.title: Partial Trade Detected
partialTradeDetected.description:
Due to a rare Solana network issue, only some of the component tokens for your basket were traded, while the others failed. As we couldn't complete all required trades, your basket token couldn't be minted or redeemed.

Your funds (both converted component tokens and any remaining SOL) are safely held in the Pie.fun vault.

To recover your funds, please click 'Swap Back to SOL' button below. This will convert all tokens in the vault back to SOL and return them to your wallet.

tradingSuccessful.title: Trading Successful
tradingSuccessful.description: Your basket token was successfully traded. Thank you for your patience.

depositStep0.title: Select the token you want to deposit
depositStep0.description: * The Basket you‚Äôre currently viewing is on the {chain} chain.
depositStep0.depositThisTokenDescription: To trade this Basket, you need to deposit {ticker}.
depositStep0.notForThisTokenDecription: You can deposit {ticker}, but not for this Basket.

depositStep1.title: Choose your preferred method to deposit

recommand.title: Recommend
recommand.description: Deposit at least 0.1 SOL for smooth trading.

bridge.description: Do you have assets on other chains?
bridge.title: Bridge assets from EVM
bridge.descriptionDisconnect: Disconnection is available in your wallet settings.

relayErrors.AMOUNT_TOO_LOW: Amount is too small to cover transaction fees
relayErrors.ERC20_ROUTER_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND: Router address for ERC20 token not found
relayErrors.EXTRA_TXS_NOT_SUPPORTED: Extra transactions are not supported for this operation
relayErrors.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Insufficient balance to perform crosschain action
relayErrors.INSUFFICIENT_LIQUIDITY: Solver liquidity is insufficient to fulfill order
relayErrors.INVALID_ADDRESS: Address format is invalid or address has been blocked by OFAC
relayErrors.NO_QUOTES: No quotes available for the requested transaction
relayErrors.NO_SWAP_ROUTES_FOUND: No valid swap routes found for the requested pair
relayErrors.SWAP_IMPACT_TOO_HIGH: Swap price impact exceeds acceptable threshold
relayErrors.SWAP_QUOTE_FAILED: Failed to get quote for swap operation
relayErrors.UNSUPPORTED_CURRENCY: Currency is not a valid native currency or erc20 token
relayErrors.UNSUPPORTED_EXECUTION_TYPE: Requested execution type is not supported
relayErrors.UNSUPPORTED_ROUTE: Combination of chains and/or currencies is not supported
relayErrors.USER_RECIPIENT_MISMATCH: User and recipient addresses do not match when required

withdraw.keepAtLeastAmount: Please keep at least {amount} SOL in your account for rent fee.

fail.description:
Withdrawal status couldn‚Äôt be confirmed within 60 seconds.

Please check on Solscan for confirmation of success.

signInHeroSection.description: Easily log in and navigate back to the main page.

totalValue.title: Total Value
totalValue.tooltip: The combined value of your deposit balance and current basket value.

depositBalance.title: Deposit Balance
depositBalance.tooltip: The current balance of your deposited funds in SOL.

currentBasketValue.title: Current Basket Value
currentBasketValue.tooltip: The total value of your current investments in basket tokens.

accountSetup.title: Welcome! Create your account

usernameErrorMessage.invalidCharacters: Use only English letters, numbers, '.', '_', or '-'

tutorial.buyOneclick: Invest in multiple memecoins simultaneously with just one click.
tutorial.lessRisky: Watch as they rebalance to outperform human strategies.
tutorial.sellAnytime: Sell anytime to exit your position.

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.description: (404) The page you are looking for does not exist.

commonError.title: An Unknown Error Occurred
commonError.description: Please copy the error code below and contact our support team for assistance.

geoBlockPage.title: You are from a blocked IP
geoBlockPage.description:
Sorry, pie.fun is not available in your country.

Check the country list from the Terms of Service.



Please connect from other locations.

useOnMobile.title: Use Pie.fun on Mobile
useOnMobile.description:
Add Pie.fun to your home screen

and use it just like an app!
useOnMobile.caption: (You can also use it like an application on desktop.)

basketDiscontinuation.descriptionBrief:
Please note that this basket may be discontinued by its Creator at any time due to performance issues or other factors.

In the event of discontinuation:
basketDiscontinuation.descriptionMint: New mints of the basket token will be suspended
basketDiscontinuation.descriptionSol: All assets within the basket will be swapped to SOL
basketDiscontinuation.descriptionSell: You will be able to sell your basket tokens to receive equivalent SOL based on your token holdings

riskFactors.title: Additional risk factors
riskFactors.descriptionValue: The value of assets within the basket may fluctuate significantly due to market conditions
riskFactors.descriptionLimit: There may be periods of limited liquidity which could affect your ability to mint or sell basket tokens
riskFactors.descriptionOperation: Smart contract vulnerabilities or technical issues could impact basket operations
riskFactors.descriptionOwnRisk: Individual assets within the basket may experience their own risks, including but not limited to protocol changes, hacks, or delistings
riskFactors.descriptionSubject: The basket's composition and strategy may be subject to change
riskFactors.descriptionTrade: Transaction fees and network conditions may affect the timing and execution of trades
riskFactors.descriptionAccept: By interacting with this basket, you acknowledge and accept these risks. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
